name: Escape!! Timmy's Personal Well
description:
Another weekly challenge game!!! WHOO

This ones theme is Escape, and just in time too. Little Timmy fell down the well again, hes gotta jump out, watch out for falling ledges, dangerous fog and goopy slime. If you fall off, litte Timmy dies! So bring your quick hands with you.

Use the left and right arrow keys or the 'A' and 'D' keys to move Timmy left and right on his journey out of the well.
